item.title: Pvp alll OVER
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

public boolean isInPvP(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if ((absX >= x1) || (absX <= x2) ||(absY >= y1) || (absY <= y2)) { return false; } return true; }Will make everwhere PvP except the coords, where:

x1: Lower left corner
x2: Top right corner
y1: Lower left corner
y2: Top right corner

Such as a bank.

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp alll OVER
item.dc:creator: @v_i_n_e v i n e
item.description:
@v_i_n_e wrote:

Hey guys im using a delta base source and i found some coords in the client. java files (server sided) So here is what i found, public boolean isInPvP(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if ((absX <= 2867) || (absX >= 2806) ||(absY <= 3393) || (absY >= 3335)){ return true; } return false;

and

[code=cil]public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
if (Type == 1) {
if ((coordY >= 3838) && (coordY <= 3910) && (coordX <= 2630)
&& (coordX >= 2584)) {

			return true;
		}
	} else if (Type == 2) {
		if ((coordY >= 2585) && (coordY <= 3901) && (coordX <= 2621)
				&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
			return true;
		}
	}
	return false;
}[/code]

I changed some coords and fucked up my wild lol, so how would i make everywhere pvp like cammypvp servers? THANKS SO MUCH GUYS!

Read full topic
